document_data.name: ''Shield of the Falling Stars''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''shield of the falling stars''''' was a [[magic]]al [[tower shield]] that had been blessed by the [[deity]] [[Ilmater]].
document_data.Powers: This [[shield]] offered great protection against non-magical missiles such as [[arrow]]s, [[crossbow]] [[bolt]]s or other similar projectiles.
document_data.History:
The ''shield of falling stars'' was once carried by a young squire who went through heroic lengths to ensure the safety and well-being of his [[steed]]. In the middle of a great battle with a horde of [[hobgoblin]]s, the young man was sent to call for reinforcements for the cavalry division that had been overwhelmed. When he saw that the sun had been blocked from the sky by scores of arrows that would soon fall upon himself and his mount, he lifted his shield and threw his body in front of the cascade of projectiles.

Seeing this selfless-act, Ilmater blessed the young man's shield, protecting his steed and ensuring his sacrifice was not in vain.

While the squire died from his wounds, his horse continued the trip unharmed, carrying his body to their military superiors and signaling the mounted warriors' needs for aide on the battlefield. The brave young man's was carried off to the nearest town and he was ''[[Resurrection (spell)|resurrected]]'' for his valorous deeds.

At some point during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]], the shield came into the possession of [[Tremain Belde'ar]].
